ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Thea P. Herman ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. THEA P. HERMAN, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective December 31, 2013.
